segments.text: What would you be doing in U . S . A ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most of the time I'll be on a tour , enjoying the beautiful scenery there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want to see particularly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll go to the Yellow Stone Park , and Great Canyon .
segments.speaker: S2
